betterstats.gui.menu_item.hide_empty.too:
Hides general, food, and monster statistics that
do not have a value assigned to them yet.
betterstats.gui.menu_item.show_item_name: Shows item names in the item statistic tooltips.
betterstats.gui.stat.mob.error:
This Entity threw an Exception (error) while
attempting to render it. See the Options tab
for more info.
betterstats.config.BSConfig.BS_OPTIONS_G:
When disabled, this Options tab will become
inaccessible. Proceed with caution.
betterstats.config.BSConfig.SEEN_BSS.too:
Keeps track of whether or not you have seen
the Better Statistics Screen before.
betterstats.config.BSConfig.ALLOW_CHEATS: Allow cheats (requires perm. lvl2 or OP)

Allows you to shift+[click/enter] items in
item stats to /give them to yourself.
Requires /give permission.
betterstats.config.BSConfig.IGNORE_ENTIT:
Some modded entities might not support the way
this mod handles and renders them, resulting in
errors. This option tries to ignore those errors.

For example, some entities may always assume they
are in a ServerWorld, while this mod renders them
on the screen using the ClientWorld.

Please see COLOR_STAT_BG_ERRORED.
betterstats.config.BSConfig.COLOR_STAT_B:
The stat. background color that will be used in
the event that something goes wrong while
rendering a given statistic (mostly for mob stats).

If you set this color to the same color as
COLOR_STAT_BG, tooltips for stats will not
show any errors that occur (if they occur).
betterstats.config.BSConfig.DEBUG_SHOW_E:
Shows all statistics entries, regardless
of their values.
betterstats.config.BSConfig.DEBUG_DINNER: Mobs in mob statistics go upside-down.
